title: SONY Bravia W622F 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart TV  (KLV-32W622F)

product_specification.In The Box: 1U (Unit) [Including - Warranty Card, AC Adapter, AC Power Cord, Remote Control, Table-Top Stand, User Manual - 1U each Batterier-2U]
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details:
We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience.. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.
Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void

product_description.Every Detail Comes to Life: The X-Reality PRO picture-processing technology delivers exceptional clarity by upscaling every pixel. It matches each scene during the analysis of frames with Sony's special image database to refine images and reduce noise.
product_description.Enjoy Thrilling Entertainment: Enjoy your favourite games and movies in vividly detailed HDR. It supports myriad HDR formats, such as HDR10 and Hybrid Log-Gamma.

review:
TV picture and sound quality is best for the price. The only competitor is samsung 32n4300 which is better in terms of smart tv.
If you want a full smart tv then go for Samsung model
if you want best picture and sound quality with some smart tv features then go for sony tv.
Bluetooth support is not available in sony.
also usb teathring and smart plug and play is not compatible with all smartphones.
Viewing angles are excellent. And screen mirror function is much better compare to Samsung tv.

Good tv. Picture quality is excellent for 720p. sound clarity is about average but definitely loud. Excellent viewing angles. connectivity & features are average for a normal smart tv usage. value for money score - 3.5/5. overpriced for what it brings to the table. I chose this besides the high price because it had a promising picture quality & great viewing angles & a brand value attached to it

I checked the quality branded TVs like samsung, lg,panasonic and then decided to but Sony.
Its a awesome TV with superb video and audio quality.Mirror cast works fine. If you have the budget then just go for it.
Few apps like youtube,netflix etc are pre installed. Note that this is not a android TV and you cannot install apps.
Only disappointment is that there is no pre installed Hotstar(I guess since star is a rival to sony they have not included it).

I've started loving FlipKart!! Beautiful product with accurate description and almost Rs 5k less than other online and physical stores. Ontime delivery with before scheduled installation made the purchase a wonderful experience. Thanks.

Picture quality is good in sd channels also. Sound quality ok in sd channels. you can use extra speakers & it becomes mini theatre. Picture and sound quality awesome in hd channels or in 720 or1080 pixel video just near to full hd. youtube available . Timely delivery & installation.
super sound quality, super picture quality with good connectivity! Go for it if you like Good sound and picture quality tv, and a reliable brand too!

Awesome TV such Brilliant picture Quality, cinematic 3D sound Quality, and lots more features. My parents are very happy:) Flipkart delivery and installation service was just mind blowingly fast. Close ur eyes and buy it...It's more than worth of ur money ;)

This TV is quite awesome. It will give you an excellent picture quality. It is also capable of providing you with a crystal clear sound with a perfect bass. The colours of the pictures are so clear that it will help you find out each & every image on the screen. It's an absolute pleasure to sit in front of Sony KLV - 622f & you will feel like keep watching through the whole day....!! If you crave for high picture & sound quality, go for this TV right now. I'm a die hard consumer of SONY. I use Sony mobiles, Sony Home Theatre and now Sony Bravia Smart TV. I connect it with Sony Xa1 ultra smartphone for surfing the net. I have attached it with the Sony SA-D40 Home Theatre for much better sound experience. Overall I'm enjoying a heaven in my room...... Thanks to flipkart for delivering it right on the exact date. 5 start from me.

The telivision is so good with the picture quality.This is my first very led TV and i'm very much satisfied with it and even the screen mirroring works so fast (with some micro second delay) and accurate.
Quality is ok but i think it should be better for this price, sound quality should be improved as sub woofer doesn’t work very well picture quality is good
